plain: Based on the user's favorite movies, it can be inferred that their favorite genre is likely crime/drama/thriller. They seem to prefer complex, twist-filled plots with well-developed characters. Their favorite musical score is likely dark, intense, and fits the mood of the movie. Their favorite mood for the musical score is likely tense, suspenseful, or dark. Their favorite setting is likely urban, modern, or gritty. Their favorite visual style is likely realistic, gritty, or cinematic. Their favorite writing style is likely complex, character-driven, or thought-provoking. Their favorite runtime is likely 2-3 hours. Their favorite themes are likely crime, justice, psychology, or suspense.
